## IComponentRendererProvider interface

Wrapper of [IComponentRendererFactory](./core.icomponentrendererfactory.md) to get entity renderers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IComponentRendererProvider<TComponentRenderer extends TUnknownComponentRenderer> 
```
